recipe.name: Tomato Rice Soup
recipe.ingredients: 57 grams (4 tablespoons) butter 185 grams (1 large) onion, peeled and quartered 115 grams (2 medium) carrots, peeled and cut in chunks 227 grams fire roasted red pepper, peeled, cored, seeded 794 grams (28-ounce can) tomato puree 907 grams (32 ounces) chicken stock 2 teaspoons salt (or to taste) 2 teaspoons balsamic vinegar 1 teaspoon dry basil 3 tablespoons Jasmine or Basmati rice Sour cream (optional)

step.describe: Scrape down sides of bowl. Add roasted red peppers.
Add tomato puree, chicken stock, salt, balsamic vinegar, and basil.

Remove lid carefully, since the soup will be very hot.
Serve hot. Add a spoon of sour cream to each serving, if desired.
